{{Location Intro|{{Lang|'''Feiyun Slope'''|zh=绯云坡|zh_rm=Fēiyún-pō}}|description=<p>{{If Self|Feiyun Slope|It|Feiyun Slope}} is Liyue Harbor's prosperous merchant district, and is the entrance to the city when coming from the main road to the north. It is centrally located between the two other districts of the Harbor: [[Chihu Rock]] to the southeast and [[Yujing Terrace]] to the west.</p>}}

==Trivia==
* The {{Lang|"Feiyun"|zh=绯云|zh_rm=Fēiyún|zh_tl=Scarlet Clouds}} in Feiyun Slope actually uses different characters than the {{Lang|"Feiyun"|zh=飞云|zh_rm=Fēiyún|zh_tl=Flying Clouds}} in [[Feiyun Commerce Guild]]. However, they are pronounced identically in Chinese. This may be intentional and one may be named after another.
